Name: Eternal Pain: Epiphany
About the game: Mental pain will never disappear, it will forever torment the soul of the protagonist. Who is he? How did he end up here? Why do dead people appear before him? Who is this girl with bandaged eyes? Eternal Pain: Epiphany is the story of the insight of a person who finds himself in purgatory. -A gloomy story with elements of mysticism and philosophy. -Twelve characters. -Viewing the memories of people in the style of comics. -Music with religious motives.
